email_text: Hi, I'm Rahul Kumar. My email is rahul@gmail.com and phone is 9876543210. I have a billing issue.
Internet is down again in my area.
My account was charged twice last month, please assist.
I can't log into my account after the recent update.
Need information on your premium plans.
How do I update my billing address?
The new feature is not working as expected.
Can you provide a status update on my support ticket?
Thank you for your help with my last issue.
